column5: This beautiful and well maintained 2 bedroom/2 bath condo will meet all of your vacation needs. Enjoy wood floors throughout and updated kitchen with black appliances including a flat top stove! Fully equipped with linens, towels, cooking utensils, washer/dryer, Flat Screen TVs, and so much more.
column8: Beautifully updated Comal River Hideaway! - Inverness 115
